content.rendered:
The Billing Specialist Manager position will be involved with hiring, firing, employee files, training etc. -Great benefit package and competitive salary -The Billing Specialist Manager must have knowledge in the areas to include AR items listed below: AR Ratio = Current AR Balance / Average Monthly Gross Production AR Turnover Rate = AR Balance / Average Monthly Receipts Average Days Receivable = AR Balance / Daily Average Charges Collection Period = ARs / Net Patient Revenue / 365 days Gross Collection Percentage = Clinic Collections / Clinic Production Required experience:
  • Management Experience • Extensive Medical Billing Experience: 2 years
